title: Swipe up within apps does not work
content:
1. Gestures navigation turned on
2. Swipe up to exit from apps does not work and I cannot figure out why
3. Swipe up on homescreen to view multitasking apps and app drawer works
4. Swipe up to exit Google now app (left of homescreen) works
5. The bottom of the screen is responsive and works at all edges and corners
6. 2/3 button navigation works no problem
7. Problem is persistent when booting in safe mode
8. Within an app, sliding at the bottom of the screen to go to the previous app works 
9. I can't find anyone else with this issue, please help!
